alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 10:58PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jefferson, southwestern Lewis and northeastern Oswego Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1057 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Adams, or 9 miles northeast of Sandy Island Beach State Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Sandy Island Beach State Park, Adams, Redfield, Barnes Corners, Southwick Beach State Park, Adams Center, Henderson, Rodman, Orwell, Lorraine, Sandy Creek, Lacona, Mannsville, Ellisburg, Worth, Montario Point, Smartville, East Rodman, Belleville and Salmon River Reservoir. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 37 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
